meeting_info.organization: City Council Ad Hoc Administrative Affairs Committee
meeting_info.location: City Hall, 6th Floor and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the September 11, 2023 Ad Hoc Administrative Affairs Committee Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Timeline for Interim City Manager
agenda_items.description: Discuss and recommend to the City Council a timeline for naming an interim city manager based on the timeline provided by the city manager.

agenda_items.title: Candidates for Interim City Manager
agenda_items.description: Discuss candidates for the City Council to consider for the position of interim city manager.

agenda_items.title: Search Process for Interim City Manager
agenda_items.description: Consider a search process, including determining minimum qualifications for any candidates, a public input process, and determining whether to hire consultants or firms to assist with the search.
